name: The Body Wash Olibanum - Radiance Treatment Cleanse With Vitamin C + Enzymes
categories: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Wash & Shower Gel
about: What it is:A daily body cleanser with vitamin C, enzymes, and niacinamide for visibly radiant skin and with a sweet olibanum scent..Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C: Tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate visibly fades spots and reverses dullness..What Else You Need to Know:Vitamin C visibly fades spots and reverses dullness. Enzymes promotes visibly radiant skin. Niacinamide supports skinu2019s protective barrier. Pure olibanum Oil is paired with fine fragrance notes of vanilla, fig leaf, and cassis buds. There are no SLS/SLES, itu2019s dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Multi-Enzyme: Bromelain, papain, and superoxide dismutase support radiant skin..-Vitamin C: Tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate visibly improves dullness and clarity..-Pure Olibanum Oil: A pure essential oil to improve the look of skin tone....Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Coco-Glucoside, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Chloride, Niacinamide, Papain, Bromelain, Superoxide Dismutase, Tocopherol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Illite, Glucose, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Boswellia Carterii Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Hydroxycitronellal, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use as your daily cleanser on wash day.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -Apply all over the body. .-Massage to create a rich foam. .-Rinse well.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        -This product pairs well with Necessaire Olibanum Body Lotion for a treatment experience (sold separately). ..Recycling Instructions:.-Necessaire has partnered with How2Recycle to provide third-party verified recycling claims. -The bottle is made from 100% bio-resin. The bottle is recyclable. The carton and insert are made with FSC-Certified, PCR Kraft Board. Bottle and carton can be recycled via US | Canada Curbside. .-Necessaire is a Certified B Corp, Certified Climate Neutral, Certified Plastic Neutral and a 1% For The Planet Member donating 1% of all sales to environmental non-profits fighting to defend our air, land, water and wild-life world wide. When you shop Necessaire, the full carbon and plastic footprint has been offset by the brand.

reviews.review_title: A complicated scent and luxe texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So many thanks to Necessaries for gifting me the Body Wash in Olibanum. Necessaireu2019s Body Wash tagline is u201cTreat your body like your faceu201d and the luxe texture of this body wash holds up to that motto. It includes vitamins C and E, Nicainamide (which Iu2019ve previously only seen in facial products), and glycerin which helps cleanse without stripping moisture (and leaves my skin really soft) It really is a sensuous experience solely for the texture, and now Necessaire has added signature scents that are so luxurious. This one is Olibanum, which is apparently another name for Frankincense. The scent is a bit resinous, a bit pine-y, with a touch of citrus. I actually find this scent a little muddy: it is a complex fragrance that changes every time I smell it, but sometimes Iu2019m not totally sure I love it.
